translation:
Most esteemed Senhor Prado

I owe responses to many official letters and letters from Your Lordship in Montevideo, as well as regarding the money that I have ascertained for it, since with the payment of the notes about to be made, such remittances cannot be delayed.

Please excuse this reminder and dispose of Your very affectionate and obliged friend Domingos José de Almeida  
Caçapava, March 19, 1839

March — 19 — 39 . Almeida

To the Illustrious Senhor Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Chief of Police of the Department and Border of Alegrete. From Domingos José de Almeida.
